ygData.subject: Monkey money
ygData.msgSnippet: 1000 pp in the bank for a lvl 18 monk?  I d guess you do a LOT of trading.  Don t think I had a grand in the bank until I was doing HGs in Rathe.  But then I
ygData.messageBody:
1000 pp in the bank for a lvl 18 monk? I'd guess you do a LOT of
trading. Don't think I had a grand in the bank until I was doing HGs
in Rathe. But then I spend no time at all trading, usually just give
my obselete stuff to friends or strangers.

>Message: 12
> Date: Fri, 04 Feb 2000 20:10:27 GMT
> From: "Thom Green" <thom_mg@...>
>Subject: Re: Re: What to buy?
>
>First off, I am not twinked, every thing I got I earned the money for myself. As a monk this is really easy to do as monks dont have anything to spend money on but good armor. By the time I was 10th level, I had over 100 plat saved, by the time I reached 18th I had bought and sold over 1000 plat worth of stuff, all done by money and items I have earned myself by selling loot or trade skills.

>Shelza, 18th, Karana.


Sparx Dreamreaver
Level 36, Karana
- Resists'R'Us -
